title: SnapCNC CNC Controller Software for Grbl
description:
SnapCNC is a modern microcontroller based USB Control System for CNC machines.

Features:

* Full featured G-Code  interpreter
* No restrictions on  number of lines
* All pins freely assignable(With snapbox)
* Build in 3D SVG to G-Code converter
* Works with 0, 3 or 6 limit switches 
* Controls 3 Axes, 2 spindle relays and 1 cooling relays
* Native homing routine
* Tool length  sensor input
* Can  reposition G-Code to X0/Y0 (move PCBs  to top-left)
* Several view modes
* Extensive error reporting
* SnapCNC comes in English & German
* Based on GRBL with hundreds of support sites on the web
